title: Azure Data Factory Landing Area
description: When using an ELT ('pushdown') approach for data integration, BimlFlex creates a number of Execute Pipelines with various Stored Procedure calls and Copy Activities.

frontMatter.name: Configure Azure Data Factory Landing Area
frontMatter.summary: Instructions on how to configure Azure Data Factory Landing Area accessible by SQL Based ELT stored procedures
